question: In some countries more and more people are becoming interested in finding out about the history of the house or building they live in. What are the reasons for this? How can people research this?
text: In recent years, many populations have been focused on investigating the past of their residents. This essay will discuss why people like to discover the mansion they live in and how society finds the information in regard to the past.

Among all these, one of the crucial points is nations want to know the history of their residents which is the nature of human beings. In other words, means that curiosity is one of the human instincts. Maybe someone and something stimulates the public’s interest to search for the truth. In an attempt to solve their doubt that they ask in the heart. Take Germany’s citizens to be an example. More than half of people have already discovered the building they live in. It reflected that humans are inborn in curiosity.

The further point to be mentioned is that the owner tends to invest in their ownerships. Therefore, they are keen to check the history of their property. Owing to many old buildings gradually becoming valuable, many owners start to invest in their properties. Do they want to know if this property is worth investing in? From other perspectives, they can find whether this building is infamy or not. For example, if the owner does not know this building is notoriety,  they will regret it very much in the future due to this worth cannot be valuable.

One of the obvious methods is talking with the elderly in the communities ranging from neighbours and grandparents.  Moreover, folk can discover the history of civilization by using public facilities individually. For example, they can find so much helpful information in the library. Besides, the internet also is a great choice for the public. People can do detailed research on the online network.
In a nutshell, curiosity and investment are two possible reasons that they intend to live or invest in. It is hoped that society can find the appropriate answer by using different ways.
